content: PR 4-22 Horizontal rotating laser level Robust exterior rotary laser level for horizontal leveling (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Laser layout tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy to use – one button design enables one-person operation, now with an extended range of up to 800m (diameter) Fast and reliable detection – universal PRA 4 laser receiver with digital offset and large 13 cm receiver window provide quick and reliable laser detection over the entire working range Durable and drop-resistant – new aluminum core, internal dampers, shock-absorbing head/handles, and IP66 rating to help maintain laser accuracy in rough jobsite conditions Smarter features with Nuron – smart asset tracking, battery life indication, and all on one battery platform help keep your tool park streamlined and cost-efficient Strobe-shield mode – integrated technology protects against false detections from lights, LEDs, and glass/metal reflections to help improve consistency and productivity on the job site Applications Horizontal leveling during excavation tasks Leveling formwork and pouring concrete Transferring and checking reference heights ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accuracy: ±0.06 in at 100 ft Laser class: < 4.85 mW, 620-690 nm, Class 2 (EN 60825), Class II (FDA CFR 21 art. 1040) Self leveling range at room temperature: ±5(±8.7%) ° Technical Data | Accuracy | ±0.06 in at 100 ft | Laser class | < 4.85 mW, 620-690 nm, Class 2 (EN 60825), Class II (FDA CFR 21 art. 1040) | Self leveling range at room temperature | ±5(±8.7%) ° | Rotation speed | 600 rpm | IP protection class | IP 66 (EN 60529) - battery compartment excluded | Operating temperature range | -4 - 122 °F | Maximum operating time | 35 h ### ITEMS- 3951806 - PR 4-22 Rotating Laser 5 Pack (Tool and Receiver Only) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5x PR 4-22 Rotating laser - 5x PRA 4 Laser receiver - 10x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 5x PRA 83 Laser receiver holder - 5x PR 4x-22 Tool case assy - 2399576 - Rotating laser PR 4-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PR 4-22 Rotating laser - 1x PRA 4 Laser receiver - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x PRA 83 Laser receiver holder - 1x PR 4x-22 Tool case assy
